query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_articles,
  COUNT(DISTINCT source) as unique_sources,
  AVG(relevanceScore) as avg_score,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN industries IS NOT NULL AND industries != 'null' THEN 1 END) as articles_with_industries
FROM articles

  AVG(relevanceScore) as avg_score,
